name: SpaceZ
description:
SpaceZ

Made by SMH Studios.

Made for the Redefine 2021 Game Jam.

Everything made on the Game Jam time.

Story:

An asteroid is approaching the Earth and you have to save humanity!!

You are the new director of SpaceZ, and you have to build a Warp Drive, a spaceship capable of going faster than light, to colonize a habitable exoplanet in Andromeda.

To build it, you have to explore the solar system and build some labs.

Can you save humanity?

Objective:

Build the Warp Drive (a spaceship) to win.

Controls: Spaceship:

Mouse to rotate.

space, left click or w to move.

Move the mouse closer or further away from the spaceship to control the speed.
Get closer to a planet to land.

Music:

Space Ambience by Alexander Nakarada | https://www.serpentsoundstudios.com

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com
